name: hail2u.net
description: Here is a decent document, a simple translation, and a weblog article about web development. These are written by Kyo Nagashima.
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.postblog: git add -- ./src/weblog/plugins/state/ && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Update cache files"
scripts.precss: npm run test_css && npm run clear
scripts.deploy: cd ./dist/ && git add --all && git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.posthtml: npm run style-guide && npm run index
scripts.prejs: npm run test_js && npm run clear && cp -rT ./src/js/ ./tmp/
scripts.postpublic: cd ./dist/ && git commit "--message=Upload" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.test: npm run test_html && npm run test_css && npm run test_js
